# Snippet Share

> A secure, zero-knowledge code snippet sharing platform built for developers. Your code is encrypted in your browser before it reaches our servers.

## Core Pages

- [Homepage](https://snippet-share.com/) - Main landing page with features and security information
- [Create Snippet](https://snippet-share.com/new) - Code snippet creation interface with encryption

## What We Do

Share code snippets instantly and securely. Perfect for developers who need to:
- Share code with teammates or clients
- Send code samples during interviews
- Collaborate on debugging sessions
- Share sensitive code without exposing it to third parties

## Key Benefits

- **Completely Private**: Your code is encrypted before it leaves your browser
- **No Sign-up Required**: Start sharing immediately
- **Auto-Delete**: Set snippets to expire after time or views
- **Beautiful Code Display**: Syntax highlighting for all major languages
- **Free to Use**: Core features available at no cost
- **Fast & Reliable**: Global performance via Cloudflare

## Security Promise

We use zero-knowledge encryption - even we can't read your code. All encryption happens in your browser using military-grade AES-256 encryption. Your encryption keys never touch our servers.
